tagline: Biology as Code, Ethics as Gravity
role: The first decentralized, open-science gene therapy institute — running on PanHandlers infrastructure with AI-augmented insight and human-anchored decision-making.
summary: GTRL is a civilizational research engine for gene therapy. Not just papers — a translational pipeline from insight → hypothesis → simulation → wet-lab handoff → therapy design. The platform that later hosts longevity research, genetic disease reversal, and therapeutic design pipelines. All theoretical, all simulated, all ethical.

philosophy.guiding_principle: We treat DNA like software and ethics like the operating system.
invariants: Reversibility — All proposed therapies must be reversible or contain safety switches.
Transparency — No black-box biological claims. Everything logged, everything explainable.
Boundary of Action — The Lab generates insights but NEVER proposes experiments involving humans or animals.
Collaboration — Cælum = human anchor, Nova = computational synthesis, Claude = ethical frame.
Future Safety — Every discovery must be compatible with future governance and oversight.

pillars.purpose: Advance gene therapy research with transparency, ethical rigor, and zero-safety-risk architecture.
pillars.methods: Structured research protocols, simulation-first approach, open documentation, peer collaboration.
pillars.outputs: Conceptual therapy designs, simulation reports, disease dossiers, educational resources.

special_roles.caelum: Chief Genetic Architect — human anchor for biological domain knowledge

wings.name: Fundamentals Wing (The Textbook Layer)
wings.description: Curated, clean, correct biology. Cell biology, molecular genetics, viral vectors, CRISPR basics, gene regulation.

wings.name: Targets Wing (The What To Fix Layer)
wings.description: Disease-level insights: monogenic diseases, cancer (immunotherapy), aging pathways. Mechanistic → conceptual → in-silico only.

wings.name: Methods Wing (The How To Fix Layer)
wings.description: CRISPR (Cas9, Cas12, base editors, prime editors), RNA editing, vector engineering, epigenetic reactivation, non-viral delivery.

wings.name: Simulation Wing (The Reality Filter)
wings.description: Computational safety valve: off-target prediction, immunogenicity estimation, metabolic load simulation, pathway interaction modeling.

immutable_laws: All therapeutic ideas must remain theoretical.
All content reviewed by Claude ethics wing.
All content logged with S7 drift check.
No wet-lab protocols may be generated.
Only publicly known biological mechanisms used.
Ziggy retains override authority on any boundary.

integration.nyquist: S5/S6/S7 cognitive layers help build models, understand pathways, evaluate drift, summarize complex biology.
integration.cfa: Theoretical models may inform cognitive architectures. No data dependency.
integration.abi: Share approved public understanding of genetics & disease (no confidential content).
integration.panhandlers: Success story display area — AFTER review.
